name: Tiny Device #07: Jukebox
description:
This #OBJKT plays all available audio NFTs from H=N

100 Total editions:
- 50 available for everyone
- 50 reserved for awarding the best music artists & contributors on H=N

Controls:
1) Play/Pause: Spacebar, '4', Media Play/Pause Key
2) Shuffle: 'S', '3', '/'
3) Previous Track: '[', '1', Media Prev Key
4) Next Track: ']', '6', Media Next Key
5) Seek Backward: '<', '2', Left Arrow
6) Seek Forward: '>', '5', Right Arrow
7) Volume: Arrow Up, Arrow Down, Mouse Wheel over slider, +Shift: change by 10
8) Display mode switch: '~', '\', Enter

Techical Details:
- Supports system media controls
- Volume slider may not work on iOS due to Safari API limitations
- Supports custom ban list, please report any copyminter objkts
- Supports script upgrades in case of emergency

Made by https://twitter.com/neelts
Powered by https://hicdex.com

With 🖤 to all music artists & contributors on H=N!
